DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the possible harvest of a tensor fasciae latae flap based on septocutaneous perforators.This study should further confirm our data from an anatomical study concerning location, distribution, diameter and differentiation of the perforators.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Experience With a Tensor Fasciae Latae Perforator Flap Based on Septocutaneous Perforators
DOC.criteria: soft tissue defect no previous operations in the thigh region obese patients
